original_text:
Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves,
    for the rights of all who are destitute.
korean_text: 너는 말 못하는 자와 모든 고독한 자의 송사를 위하여 입을 열지니라

sentences.original_text: Speak up for those who cannot speak for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 스스로 말할 수 없는 사람들을 위해 목소리를 내라

sentences.original_text: for the rights of all who are destitute
